channel.title: Revenue Maximization on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Revenue Maximization on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Practical $0.385$-Approximation for Submodular Maximization Subject to a Cardinality Constraint
item.description: A novel algorithm achieves a 0.385-approximation for submodular maximization under cardinality constraints, combining strong theoretical guarantees with practical query complexity.
